text: @johncardillo @realDonaldTrump He’s correct. Do you people ever read what Dr. Fauci says in media interviews? Fauci said on Monday there is "no scientific evidence" to point to coronavirus having been *manufactured* in a Chinese lab. “Manipulated” as a bio-weapon. There’s isn’t any evidence!
